job_history.work_description: Trained and work directly with MetroPCS HQ Build social media posts, advertising and promotions across social media platforms Engage in customer service via Facebook, Facebook Latino, Twitter and Instagram Monitor online public relations and continuously send in 'Hot Topics' to create new content online Sponsorship coordinator Escalate customer concerns directly to MetroPCS markets nationwide.

Retention department for Metro PCS Cell Phone Company Inbound and outbound calls Answered customer service calls, and escalated/supervisor calls Floor walker in a call center environment to assist training agents Worked with upper management to ensure appropriate changes were made to improve customer satisfaction. Made reasonable procedure exceptions to accommodate unusual customer requests.

Executed store initiative related to sales, service, and customer experience. Met and exceed assigned customer experience and reputation and productivity targets. Resolved or escalated any customer service issues. Responsible for display maintenance, shelf maintenance, and store housekeeping.
Face-to-face customer service General office duties Inbound and outbound calls Customer account relations Customer enrollments and sales Accurately and efficiently completed all sales transactions.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in various customer-facing roles, including social media, call center, and front desk positions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in verbal and written communication through social media, phone calls, and face-to-face interactions, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Consistently handled customer complaints and escalated issues to management, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Worked collaboratively with upper management and training agents to improve customer satisfaction, indicating strong teamwork skills.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed multiple tasks and responsibilities in various roles, including sales, customer service, and social media management.

skills.name: Social Media Management
skills.explanation: Created and implemented social media posts, advertising, and promotions, demonstrating strong proficiency in social media management.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Completed sales transactions and met assigned targets, showing a solid working proficiency in sales.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Limited experience in leadership roles, but demonstrated some leadership skills as a floor walker in a call center environment.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: No direct experience with data analysis mentioned in the work descriptions.
